## Setup

Load packages and data:

```{r}
#| label: load-pkg-data
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(schrute)
library(lubridate)
library(knitr)
```

Fix the `air_date` variable type.

```{r}
#| label: data-fix

theoffice <- theoffice %>%
  mutate(air_date = ymd(as.character(air_date)))
```
